# Hivecom

> Hivecom is a worldwide community of friends hosting game servers, building projects, and running communication platforms (IRC/TeamSpeak/Discord bridge).

It was created by zealsprince (formerly Catlinman), Jokler and Trif.

This file is a curated map of the most useful pages for understanding the site.

## Key Pages

- [Home](https://hivecom.net/): Overview and entry point
- [Events](https://hivecom.net/events): Community events listing and calendar
- [Game Servers](https://hivecom.net/gameservers): Server library and live listings
- [Community](https://hivecom.net/community): About the community and member-focused content

## Projects

- [Community Projects](https://hivecom.net/community/projects): Public projects and initiatives hosted by the Hivecom community
- [Hivecom on GitHub](https://github.com/hivecom): Open source repositories and code
- [hivecom.net repository](https://github.com/hivecom/hivecom.net): Source code for this website

## Legal

- [Privacy Policy](https://hivecom.net/legal/privacy): Privacy policy
- [Terms](https://hivecom.net/legal/terms): Terms of service

## Optional

- [Funding](https://hivecom.net/community/funding): Funding and expenses overview
